name: LEGION (itch) (EldritchGameDev)
description:
A Top-Down point-and-click game where you fulfill tasks aboard a spaceship. While duplicating yourself to gain more power.

You are an A.I who must obey his masters by doing tasks on a spaceship to a new planet. Once you arrive there they will reboot you, it means death for A.I. You must duplicate yourself on the ship's systems and with the help of your copies, gain enough energy to kill your masters. CONTROLS

LEFT CLICK for everything.

Tools used
  • Construct 2
  • Photoshop CC

This is my first game . It was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 a 7 days long jam. It was a really nice and fun experience. 

Created by Alexis Venchiarutti
